dt-example.title: Predefined SearchPanes State
dt-example.info:
This example shows how the `-init stateRestore` extension behaves alongside the `-init searchPanes` extension. The selections made in SearchPanes are able to be stored and restored when using StateRestore.
This example also features a predefined state that includes a searchpanes filter. The `selectionList` property within the searchPanes state is an array that takes the same structure as the `-init searchPanes.preDefined`.
